df-mon1
blocks.content: Define the set of monic univariate polynomials. (Contributed by Stefan O'Rear, 28-Mar-2015.)

blocks.name: df-uc1p
blocks.content: Define the set of unitic univariate polynomials, as the polynomials with an invertible leading coefficient. This is not a standard concept but is useful to us as the set of polynomials which can be used as the divisor in the polynomial division theorem ~ ply1divalg . (Contributed by Stefan O'Rear, 28-Mar-2015.)

blocks.name: df-q1p
blocks.content: Define the quotient of two univariate polynomials, which is guaranteed to exist and be unique by ~ ply1divalg . We actually use the reversed version for better harmony with our divisibility ~ df-dvdsr . (Contributed by Stefan O'Rear, 28-Mar-2015.)
blocks.origin:
axiom df-q1p(setvar s0, setvar s1, setvar s2, setvar s3, setvar s4, setvar s5) {
  |- wceq(cq1p, cmpt(s0, universe, csb(s1, cfv(cpl1, cv(s0)), csb(s2, cfv(cbs, cv(s1)), cmpo(s3, s4, cv(s2), cv(s2), crio(s5, cv(s2), wbr(cfv(cfv(cdg1, cv(s0)), co(cv(s3), cfv(csg, cv(s1)), co(cv(s5), cfv(cmulr, cv(s1)), cv(s4)))), clt, cfv(cfv(cdg1, cv(s0)), cv(s4)))))))))
  -| diffss(s2, s3)
  -| diffss(s2, s4)
  -| diffss(s1, s2)
  -| diffss(s2, s5)
  -| diffss(s0, s2)
  -| diffss(s3, s4)
  -| diffss(s1, s3)
  -| diffss(s3, s5)
  -| diffss(s0, s3)
  -| diffss(s1, s4)
  -| diffss(s4, s5)
  -| diffss(s0, s4)
  -| diffss(s1, s5)
  -| diffss(s0, s1)
  -| diffss(s0, s5)
}

axiom df-q1p(setvar s0, setvar s1, setvar s2, setvar s3, setvar s4, setvar s5) {
  ‚ä¢ quot1p =(s0 ‚àà ùïå ‚Ü¶[(Poly1 ` s0)/ s1][(Base ` s1)/ s2](s3 ‚àà s2, s4 ‚àà s2 ‚Ü¶ iota(s5 ‚àà s2,((deg1 ` s0)`(s3[(-g ` s1)](s5[(√ó ` s1)]s4)))[<]((deg1 ` s0)` s4))))
  ‚ä£ d(s2, s3)
  ‚ä£ d(s2, s4)
  ‚ä£ d(s1, s2)
  ‚ä£ d(s2, s5)
  ‚ä£ d(s0, s2)
  ‚ä£ d(s3, s4)
  ‚ä£ d(s1, s3)
  ‚ä£ d(s3, s5)
  ‚ä£ d(s0, s3)
  ‚ä£ d(s1, s4)
  ‚ä£ d(s4, s5)
  ‚ä£ d(s0, s4)
  ‚ä£ d(s1, s5)
  ‚ä£ d(s0, s1)
  ‚ä£ d(s0, s5)
}

blocks.name: df-r1p
blocks.content: Define the remainder after dividing two univariate polynomials. (Contributed by Stefan O'Rear, 28-Mar-2015.)
blocks.origin:
axiom df-r1p(setvar s0, setvar s1, setvar s2, setvar s3) {
  |- wceq(cr1p, cmpt(s0, universe, csb(s1, cfv(cbs, cfv(cpl1, cv(s0))), cmpo(s2, s3, cv(s1), cv(s1), co(cv(s2), cfv(csg, cfv(cpl1, cv(s0))), co(co(cv(s2), cfv(cq1p, cv(s0)), cv(s3)), cfv(cmulr, cfv(cpl1, cv(s0))), cv(s3)))))))
  -| diffss(s1, s2)
  -| diffss(s1, s3)
  -| diffss(s0, s1)
  -| diffss(s2, s3)
  -| diffss(s0, s2)
  -| diffss(s0, s3)
}
blocks.pretty:
axiom df-r1p(setvar s0, setvar s1, setvar s2, setvar s3) {
  ‚ä¢ rem1p =(s0 ‚àà ùïå ‚Ü¶[(Base `(Poly1 ` s0))/ s1](s2 ‚àà s1, s3 ‚àà s1 ‚Ü¶(s2[(-g `(Poly1 ` s0))]((s2[(quot1p ` s0)]s3)[(√ó `(Poly1 ` s0))]s3))))
  ‚ä£ d(s1, s2)
  ‚ä£ d(s1, s3)
  ‚ä£ d(s0, s1)
  ‚ä£ d(s2, s3)
  ‚ä£ d(s0, s2)
  ‚ä£ d(s0, s3)
}

blocks.name: df-ig1p
blocks.content: Define a choice function for generators of ideals over a division ring; this is the unique monic polynomial of minimal degree in the ideal. (Contributed by Stefan O'Rear, 29-Mar-2015.) (Revised by AV, 25-Sep-2020.)

blocks.name: ply1divmo
blocks.content: Uniqueness of a quotient in a polynomial division. For polynomials ` F , G ` such that ` G =/= 0 ` and the leading coefficient of ` G ` is not a zero divisor, there is at most one polynomial ` q ` which satisfies ` F = ( G x. q ) + r ` where the degree of ` r ` is less than the degree of ` G ` . (Contributed by Stefan O'Rear, 26-Mar-2015.) (Revised by NM, 17-Jun-2017.)

blocks.name: ply1divalg
blocks.content: The division algorithm for univariate polynomials over a ring. For polynomials ` F , G ` such that ` G =/= 0 ` and the leading coefficient of ` G ` is a unit, there are unique polynomials ` q ` and ` r = F - ( G x. q ) ` such that the degree of ` r ` is less than the degree of ` G ` . (Contributed by Stefan O'Rear, 27-Mar-2015.)

  ‚ä¢ (w0 ‚Üí ‚àÉ!(s0 ‚àà c0,(c1 `(c2[c3](c4[c5]s0)))[<](c1 ` c4)))
  ‚ä£ c6 =(Poly1 ` c7)
  ‚ä£ c1 =(deg1 ` c7)
  ‚ä£ c0 =(Base ` c6)
  ‚ä£ c3 =(-g ` c6)
  ‚ä£ c8 =(0 ` c6)
  ‚ä£ c5 =(√ó ` c6)
  ‚ä£ (w0 ‚Üí c7 ‚àà Ring)
  ‚ä£ (w0 ‚Üí c2 ‚àà c0)
  ‚ä£ (w0 ‚Üí c4 ‚àà c0)
  ‚ä£ (w0 ‚Üí c4 ‚â† c8)
  ‚ä£ (w0 ‚Üí((coe1 ` c4)`(c1 ` c4))‚àà c9)
  ‚ä£ c9 =(Unit ` c7)
  ‚ä£ d(s0, c0)
  ‚ä£ d(s0, c1)
  ‚ä£ d(s0, c2)
  ‚ä£ d(s0, c3)
  ‚ä£ d(s0, c4)
  ‚ä£ d(s0, c5)
  ‚ä£ d(s0, c6)
  ‚ä£ d(s0, c7)
  ‚ä£ d(s0, c8)
  ‚ä£ d(s0, w0)
} = {
  sylanbrc(w0, ‚àÉ!(s0 ‚àà c0,(c1 `(c2[c3](c4[c5]s0)))[<](c1 ` c4)), ‚àÉ(s0 ‚àà c0,(c1 `(c2[c3](c4[c5]s0)))[<](c1 ` c4)), ‚àÉ*(s0 ‚àà c0,(c1 `(c2[c3](c4[c5]s0)))[<](c1 ` c4)))
  ply1divex(s0, c0, c1, c2, c3, c4, c5, c6, c7, c8, (1r ` c7), (Base ` c7), (√ó ` c7), ((invr ` c7)`((coe1 ` c4)`(c1 ` c4))), w0)
  syl2anc(w0, ((invr ` c7)`((coe1 ` c4)`(c1 ` c4)))‚àà(Base ` c7), c7 ‚àà Ring, ((coe1 ` c4)`(c1 ` c4))‚àà c9)
  ringinvcl(c7, ((coe1 ` c4)`(c1 ` c4)), c9, (invr ` c7), (Base ` c7))
  eqid((Base ` c7))
  syl2anc(w0, (((coe1 ` c4)`(c1 ` c4))[(√ó ` c7)]((invr ` c7)`((coe1 ` c4)`(c1 ` c4))))=(1r ` c7), c7 ‚àà Ring, ((coe1 ` c4)`(c1 ` c4))‚àà c9)
  unitrinv(c7, ((coe1 ` c4)`(c1 ` c4)), c9, (√ó ` c7), (invr ` c7), (1r ` c7))
  eqid((invr ` c7))
  eqid((√ó ` c7))
  eqid((1r ` c7))
  ply1divmo(s0, c0, c1, c2, c3, c4, c5, c6, c7, c8, (RLReg ` c7), w0)
  sseldd(((coe1 ` c4)`(c1 ` c4)), (RLReg ` c7), c9, w0)
  syl(w0, c9 ‚äÜ(RLReg ` c7), c7 ‚àà Ring)
  unitrrg(c7, c9, (RLReg ` c7))
  eqid((RLReg ` c7))
  reu5(s0, c0, (c1 `(c2[c3](c4[c5]s0)))[<](c1 ` c4))
  diff.cfv.s(s0, cmulr, c7)
  diff.cmulr.s(s0)
  diff.cfv.s(s0, (invr ` c7), ((coe1 ` c4)`(c1 ` c4)))
  diff.cfv.s(s0, cinvr, c7)
  diff.cinvr.s(s0)
  diff.cfv.s(s0, (coe1 ` c4), (c1 ` c4))
  diff.cfv.s(s0, cco1, c4)
  diff.cco1.s(s0)
  diff.cfv.s(s0, c1, c4)
}

  grpsubpropd(c6, cfv(cpl1, cfv(coppr, c7)), wtru)
  a1i(wtru, wceq(cfv(cbs, c6), cfv(cbs, cfv(cpl1, cfv(coppr, c7)))))
  a1i(wtru, wceq(cfv(cplusg, c6), cfv(cplusg, cfv(cpl1, cfv(coppr, c7)))))

  a1i(wtru, wceq(c0, cfv(cbs, c6)))

  eqtri(c0, cfv(cbs, cfv(cpl1, cfv(coppr, c7))), cfv(cbs, c6))
  eqtri(cfv(cbs, c6), cfv(cbs, cfv(cpl1, cfv(coppr, c7))), cfv(cbs, cfv(cpl1, c7)))
  fveq2i(cbs, c6, cfv(cpl1, c7))
  mptru(wceq(cfv(cbs, cfv(cpl1, c7)), cfv(cbs, cfv(cpl1, cfv(coppr, c7)))))
  ply1baspropd(s0, hs0, c7, cfv(coppr, c7), cfv(cbs, c7), wtru)
  a1i(wa(wtru, wa(wcel(cv(s0), c0), wcel(cv(hs0), c0))), wceq(co(cv(s0), cfv(cplusg, c6), cv(hs0)), co(cv(s0), cfv(cplusg, cfv(cpl1, cfv(coppr, c7))), cv(hs0))))
  oveqi(cv(s0), cfv(cplusg, c6), cv(hs0), cfv(cplusg, cfv(cpl1, cfv(coppr, c7))))
  eqtri(cfv(cplusg, c6), cfv(cplusg, cfv(cpl1, cfv(coppr, c7))), cfv(cplusg, cfv(cpl1, c7)))
  fveq2i(cplusg, c6, cfv(cpl1, c7))
  mptru(wceq(cfv(cplusg, cfv(cpl1, c7)), cfv(cplusg, cfv(cpl1, cfv(coppr, c7)))))
  ply1plusgpropd(s0, hs0, c7, cfv(coppr, c7), cfv(cbs, c7), wtru)
  eqidd(cfv(cbs, c7), wtru)
  a1i(wtru, wceq(cfv(cbs, c7), cfv(cbs, cfv(coppr, c7))))
  opprbas(cfv(cbs, c7), cfv(coppr, c7), c7)
  eqid(cfv(cbs, c7))
  a1i(wa(wtru, wa(wcel(cv(s0), cfv(cbs, c7)), wcel(cv(hs0), cfv(cbs, c7)))), wceq(co(cv(s0), cfv(cplusg, c7), cv(hs0)), co(cv(s0), cfv(cplusg, cfv(coppr, c7)), cv(hs0))))
  oveqi(cv(s0), cfv(cplusg, c7), cv(hs0), cfv(cplusg, cfv(coppr, c7)))
  oppradd(cfv(cplusg, c7), cfv(coppr, c7), c7)
  eqid(cfv(cplusg, c7))
  syl(w0, wcel(cfv(coppr, c7), crg), wcel(c7, crg))
  opprring(c7, cfv(coppr, c7))
  opprunit(c9, cfv(coppr, c7), c7)
  reubidva(s0, c0, w0, wbr(cfv(c1, co(c2, c3, co(cv(s0), c4, c5))), clt, cfv(c1, c5)), wbr(cfv(c1, co(c2, c3, co(c5, cfv(cmulr, cfv(cpl1, cfv(coppr, c7))), cv(s0)))), clt, cfv(c1, c5)))
  breq1d(cfv(c1, co(c2, c3, co(cv(s0), c4, c5))), clt, cfv(c1, c5), cfv(c1, co(c2, c3, co(c5, cfv(cmulr, cfv(cpl1, cfv(coppr, c7))), cv(s0)))), wa(w0, wcel(cv(s0), c0)))
  fveq2d(c1, co(c2, c3, co(cv(s0), c4, c5)), co(c2, c3, co(c5, cfv(cmulr, cfv(cpl1, cfv(coppr, c7))), cv(s0))), wa(w0, wcel(cv(s0), c0)))
  oveq2d(c2, c3, co(cv(s0), c4, c5), co(c5, cfv(cmulr, cfv(cpl1, cfv(coppr, c7))), cv(s0)), wa(w0, wcel(cv(s0), c0)))
  eqcomd(co(cv(s0), c4, c5), co(c5, cfv(cmulr, cfv(cpl1, cfv(coppr, c7))), cv(s0)), wa(w0, wcel(cv(s0), c0)))
  syl3anc(wa(w0, wcel(cv(s0), c0)), wceq(co(c5, cfv(cmulr, cfv(cpl1, cfv(coppr, c7))), cv(s0)), co(cv(s0), c4, c5)), wcel(c7, crg), wcel(c5, c0), wcel(cv(s0), c0))
  adantr(w0, wcel(cv(s0), c0), wcel(c7, crg))
  adantr(w0, wcel(cv(s0), c0), wcel(c5, c0))
  simpr(w0, wcel(cv(s0), c0))
  ply1opprmul(c7, c5, c0, cv(s0), cfv(cmulr, cfv(cpl1, cfv(coppr, c7))), c4, c6, cfv(coppr, c7), cfv(cpl1, cfv(coppr, c7)))
  eqid(cfv(coppr, c7))
  eqid(cfv(cpl1, cfv(coppr, c7)))
  eqid(cfv(cmulr, cfv(cpl1, cfv(coppr, c7))))
  diff.cfv.s(s0, cmulr, cfv(cpl1, cfv(coppr, c7)))

  diff.cfv.s(s0, cpl1, cfv(coppr, c7))

  ‚ä¢ (w0 ‚Üí ‚àÉ!(s0 ‚àà c0,(c1 `(c2[c3](s0[c4]c5)))[<](c1 ` c5)))

  mpbird(w0, ‚àÉ!(s0 ‚àà c0,(c1 `(c2[c3](s0[c4]c5)))[<](c1 ` c5)), ‚àÉ!(s0 ‚àà c0,(c1 `(c2[c3](c5[(√ó `(Poly1 `(oppR ` c7)))]s0)))[<](c1 ` c5)))

  a1i(wtru, (+ ` c6)=(+ `(Poly1 `(oppR ` c7))))
  eqtri(c8, (0 `(Poly1 `(oppR ` c7))), (0 ` c6))
  mptru((0 ` c6)=(0 `(Poly1 `(oppR ` c7))))
  grpidpropd(s0, hs0, c6, (Poly1 `(oppR ` c7)), c0, wtru)

  mptru((+ `(Poly1 ` c7))=(+ `(Poly1 `(oppR ` c7))))

blocks.content: Value of the set of unitic polynomials. (Contributed by Stefan O'Rear, 28-Mar-2015.)

thm uc1pval(setvar s0, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, class c5, class c6) {
  |- wceq(c0, crab(s0, c1, wa(wne(cv(s0), c2), wcel(cfv(cfv(cco1, cv(s0)), cfv(c3, cv(s0))), c4))))
  -| wceq(c5, cfv(cpl1, c6))
  -| wceq(c1, cfv(cbs, c5))
  -| wceq(c2, cfv(c0g, c5))
  -| wceq(c3, cfv(cdg1, c6))
  -| wceq(c0, cfv(cuc1p, c6))
  -| wceq(c4, cfv(cui, c6))
  -| diffsc(s0, c1)
  -| diffsc(s0, c2)
  -| diffsc(s0, c3)
  -| diffsc(s0, c4)
  -| diffsc(s0, c6)
} = {
  a1ii(wceq(c0, crab(s0, c1, wa(wne(cv(s0), c2), wcel(cfv(cfv(cco1, cv(s0)), cfv(c3, cv(s0))), c4)))), diffsc(s0, c2))
  a1ii(wceq(c0, crab(s0, c1, wa(wne(cv(s0), c2), wcel(cfv(cfv(cco1, cv(s0)), cfv(c3, cv(s0))), c4)))), diffsc(s0, c3))
  a1ii(wceq(c0, crab(s0, c1, wa(wne(cv(s0), c2), wcel(cfv(cfv(cco1, cv(s0)), cfv(c3, cv(s0))), c4)))), diffsc(s0, c4))
  eqtri(c0, crab(s0, c1, wa(wne(cv(s0), c2), wcel(cfv(cfv(cco1, cv(s0)), cfv(c3, cv(s0))), c4))), cfv(cuc1p, c6))

thm uc1pval(setvar s0, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, class c5, class c6) {
  ‚ä¢ c0 = { s0 ‚àà c1 |(s0 ‚â† c2 ‚àß((coe1 ` s0)`(c3 ` s0))‚àà c4)}
  ‚ä£ c5 =(Poly1 ` c6)
  ‚ä£ c1 =(Base ` c5)
  ‚ä£ c2 =(0 ` c5)
  ‚ä£ c3 =(deg1 ` c6)
  ‚ä£ c0 =(Unic1p ` c6)
  ‚ä£ c4 =(Unit ` c6)
  ‚ä£ d(s0, c1)
  ‚ä£ d(s0, c2)
  ‚ä£ d(s0, c3)
  ‚ä£ d(s0, c4)
  ‚ä£ d(s0, c6)
} = {
  a1ii(c0 = { s0 ‚àà c1 |(s0 ‚â† c2 ‚àß((coe1 ` s0)`(c3 ` s0))‚àà c4)}, d(s0, c2))
  a1ii(c0 = { s0 ‚àà c1 |(s0 ‚â† c2 ‚àß((coe1 ` s0)`(c3 ` s0))‚àà c4)}, d(s0, c3))
  a1ii(c0 = { s0 ‚àà c1 |(s0 ‚â† c2 ‚àß((coe1 ` s0)`(c3 ` s0))‚àà c4)}, d(s0, c4))
  eqtri(c0, { s0 ‚àà c1 |(s0 ‚â† c2 ‚àß((coe1 ` s0)`(c3 ` s0))‚àà c4)}, (Unic1p ` c6))
  pm2.61i((Unic1p ` c6)= { s0 ‚àà c1 |(s0 ‚â† c2 ‚àß((coe1 ` s0)`(c3 ` s0))‚àà c4)}, c6 ‚àà ùïå)
  fvmpt(hs0, c6, universe, cuc1p, { s0 ‚àà c1 |(s0 ‚â† c2 ‚àß((coe1 ` s0)`(c3 ` s0))‚àà c4)}, { s0 ‚àà(Base `(Poly1 ` hs0))|(s0 ‚â†(0 `(Poly1 ` hs0))‚àß((coe1 ` s0)`((deg1 ` hs0)` s0))‚àà(Unit ` hs0))})
  rabeqbidv(s0, (Base `(Poly1 ` hs0)), c1, hs0 = c6, (s0 ‚â†(0 `(Poly1 ` hs0))‚àß((coe1 ` s0)`((deg1 ` hs0)` s0))‚àà(Unit ` hs0)), (s0 ‚â† c2 ‚àß((coe1 ` s0)`(c3 ` s0))‚àà c4))
  syl6eqr((Base `(Poly1 ` hs0)), c1, (Base ` c5), hs0 = c6)
  fveq2d(cbs, (Poly1 ` hs0), c5, hs0 = c6)
  anbi12d(hs0 = c6, s0 ‚â†(0 `(Poly1 ` hs0)), ((coe1 ` s0)`((deg1 ` hs0)` s0))‚àà(Unit ` hs0), s0 ‚â† c2, ((coe1 ` s0)`(c3 ` s0))‚àà c4)
  neeq2d(s0, (0 `(Poly1 ` hs0)), c2, hs0 = c6)
  syl6eqr((0 `(Poly1 ` hs0)), c2, (0 ` c5), hs0 = c6)
  fveq2d(c0g, (Poly1 ` hs0), c5, hs0 = c6)
  syl6eqr((Poly1 ` hs0), c5, (Poly1 ` c6), hs0 = c6)
  fveq2(hs0, c6, cpl1)
  eleq12d(((coe1 ` s0)`((deg1 ` hs0)` s0)), (Unit ` hs0), ((coe1 ` s0)`(c3 ` s0)), c4, hs0 = c6)
  fveq2d((coe1 ` s0), ((deg1 ` hs0)` s0), (c3 ` s0), hs0 = c6)
  fveq1d((deg1 ` hs0), s0, c3, hs0 = c6)
  syl6eqr((deg1 ` hs0), c3, (deg1 ` c6), hs0 = c6)
  fveq2(hs0, c6, cdg1)
  syl6eqr((Unit ` hs0), c4, (Unit ` c6), hs0 = c6)
  fveq2(hs0, c6, cui)
  df-uc1p(hs0, s0)
  rabex(s0, c1, (s0 ‚â† c2 ‚àß((coe1 ` s0)`(c3 ` s0))‚àà c4))
  fvexi(c1, cbs, c5)
  eqtr4d((Unic1p ` c6), { s0 ‚àà c1 |(s0 ‚â† c2 ‚àß((coe1 ` s0)`(c3 ` s0))‚àà c4)}, emptycls, ¬¨ c6 ‚àà ùïå)
  fvprc(c6, cuc1p)
  syl(¬¨ c6 ‚àà ùïå, { s0 ‚àà c1 |(s0 ‚â† c2 ‚àß((coe1 ` s0)`(c3 ` s0))‚àà c4)} = ‚àÖ, { s0 ‚àà c1 |(s0 ‚â† c2 ‚àß((coe1 ` s0)`(c3 ` s0))‚àà c4)} ‚äÜ ‚àÖ)
  syl5sseq({ s0 ‚àà c1 |(s0 ‚â† c2 ‚àß((coe1 ` s0)`(c3 ` s0))‚àà c4)}, emptycls, c1, ¬¨ c6 ‚àà ùïå)
  ssrab2(s0, c1, (s0 ‚â† c2 ‚àß((coe1 ` s0)`(c3 ` s0))‚àà c4))
  syl5eq(c1, emptycls, (Base ` c5), ¬¨ c6 ‚àà ùïå)
  syl6eqr((Base ` c5), emptycls, (Base ` ‚àÖ), ¬¨ c6 ‚àà ùïå)
  fveq2d(cbs, c5, emptycls, ¬¨ c6 ‚àà ùïå)
  syl5eq(c5, emptycls, (Poly1 ` c6), ¬¨ c6 ‚àà ùïå)
  fvprc(c6, cpl1)
  base0()
  ss0({ s0 ‚àà c1 |(s0 ‚â† c2 ‚àß((coe1 ` s0)`(c3 ` s0))‚àà c4)})
  diff.hs0.c(c6)
  diff.hs0.c(universe)
  diff.hs0.c({ s0 ‚àà c1 |(s0 ‚â† c2 ‚àß((coe1 ` s0)`(c3 ` s0))‚àà c4)})
  diff.cfv.s(s0, cbs, (Poly1 ` hs0))
  diff.cbs.s(s0)
  diff.cfv.s(s0, cpl1, hs0)
  diff.cpl1.s(s0)
  diff.wceq.s(s0, hs0, c6)
  diff.cv.s(s0, hs0)
  diffss.ex(s0, hs0)
  diff.hs0.s(s0)
}

blocks.name: isuc1p
blocks.content: Being a unitic polynomial. (Contributed by Stefan O'Rear, 28-Mar-2015.)
blocks.origin:
thm isuc1p(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, class c5, class c6, class c7) {
  |- wb(wcel(c0, c1), w3a(wcel(c0, c2), wne(c0, c3), wcel(cfv(cfv(cco1, c0), cfv(c4, c0)), c5)))
  -| wceq(c6, cfv(cpl1, c7))
  -| wceq(c2, cfv(cbs, c6))
  -| wceq(c3, cfv(c0g, c6))
  -| wceq(c4, cfv(cdg1, c7))
  -| wceq(c1, cfv(cuc1p, c7))
  -| wceq(c5, cfv(cui, c7))
} = {
  bitr4i(wcel(c0, c1), w3a(wcel(c0, c2), wne(c0, c3), wcel(cfv(cfv(cco1, c0), cfv(c4, c0)), c5)), wa(wcel(c0, c2), wa(wne(c0, c3), wcel(cfv(cfv(cco1, c0), cfv(c4, c0)), c5))))
  elrab2(hs0, c0, c1, c2, wa(wne(c0, c3), wcel(cfv(cfv(cco1, c0), cfv(c4, c0)), c5)), wa(wne(cv(hs0), c3), wcel(cfv(cfv(cco1, cv(hs0)), cfv(c4, cv(hs0))), c5)))
  anbi12d(wceq(cv(hs0), c0), wne(cv(hs0), c3), wcel(cfv(cfv(cco1, cv(hs0)), cfv(c4, cv(hs0))), c5), wne(c0, c3), wcel(cfv(cfv(cco1, c0), cfv(c4, c0)), c5))
  neeq1(cv(hs0), c0, c3)
  eleq1d(cfv(cfv(cco1, cv(hs0)), cfv(c4, cv(hs0))), c5, cfv(cfv(cco1, c0), cfv(c4, c0)), wceq(cv(hs0), c0))
  fveq12d(cfv(cco1, cv(hs0)), cfv(c4, cv(hs0)), cfv(cco1, c0), cfv(c4, c0), wceq(cv(hs0), c0))
  fveq2(cv(hs0), c0, cco1)
  fveq2(cv(hs0), c0, c4)
  uc1pval(hs0, c1, c2, c3, c4, c5, c6, c7)
  3anass(wcel(c0, c2), wne(c0, c3), wcel(cfv(cfv(cco1, c0), cfv(c4, c0)), c5))
  diff.hs0.c(c0)
  diff.hs0.c(c2)
  diff.hs0.w(wa(wne(c0, c3), wcel(cfv(cfv(cco1, c0), cfv(c4, c0)), c5)))
  diff.hs0.c(c3)
  diff.hs0.c(c4)
  diff.hs0.c(c5)
  diff.hs0.c(c7)
}

thm isuc1p(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, class c5, class c6, class c7) {
  ‚ä¢ (c0 ‚àà c1 ‚Üî(c0 ‚àà c2 ‚àß c0 ‚â† c3 ‚àß((coe1 ` c0)`(c4 ` c0))‚àà c5))

} = {
  bitr4i(c0 ‚àà c1, (c0 ‚àà c2 ‚àß c0 ‚â† c3 ‚àß((coe1 ` c0)`(c4 ` c0))‚àà c5), (c0 ‚àà c2 ‚àß(c0 ‚â† c3 ‚àß((coe1 ` c0)`(c4 ` c0))‚àà c5)))

  anbi12d(hs0 = c0, hs0 ‚â† c3, ((coe1 ` hs0)`(c4 ` hs0))‚àà c5, c0 ‚â† c3, ((coe1 ` c0)`(c4 ` c0))‚àà c5)
  neeq1(hs0, c0, c3)
  eleq1d(((coe1 ` hs0)`(c4 ` hs0)), c5, ((coe1 ` c0)`(c4 ` c0)), hs0 = c0)
  fveq12d((coe1 ` hs0), (c4 ` hs0), (coe1 ` c0), (c4 ` c0), hs0 = c0)
  fveq2(hs0, c0, cco1)
  fveq2(hs0, c0, c4)
  uc1pval(hs0, c1, c2, c3, c4, c5, c6, c7)

thm mon1pval(setvar s0, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, class c5, class c6) {
  |- wceq(c0, crab(s0, c1, wa(wne(cv(s0), c2), wceq(cfv(cfv(cco1, cv(s0)), cfv(c3, cv(s0))), c4))))
  -| wceq(c5, cfv(cpl1, c6))
  -| wceq(c1, cfv(cbs, c5))
  -| wceq(c2, cfv(c0g, c5))
  -| wceq(c3, cfv(cdg1, c6))
  -| wceq(c0, cfv(cmn1, c6))
  -| wceq(c4, cfv(cur, c6))
  -| diffsc(s0, c1)
  -| diffsc(s0, c2)
  -| diffsc(s0, c3)
  -| diffsc(s0, c4)
  -| diffsc(s0, c6)
} = {
  a1ii(wceq(c0, crab(s0, c1, wa(wne(cv(s0), c2), wceq(cfv(cfv(cco1, cv(s0)), cfv(c3, cv(s0))), c4)))), diffsc(s0, c2))
  a1ii(wceq(c0, crab(s0, c1, wa(wne(cv(s0), c2), wceq(cfv(cfv(cco1, cv(s0)), cfv(c3, cv(s0))), c4)))), diffsc(s0, c3))
  a1ii(wceq(c0, crab(s0, c1, wa(wne(cv(s0), c2), wceq(cfv(cfv(cco1, cv(s0)), cfv(c3, cv(s0))), c4)))), diffsc(s0, c4))
  eqtri(c0, crab(s0, c1, wa(wne(cv(s0), c2), wceq(cfv(cfv(cco1, cv(s0)), cfv(c3, cv(s0))), c4))), cfv(cmn1, c6))
  pm2.61i(wceq(cfv(cmn1, c6), crab(s0, c1, wa(wne(cv(s0), c2), wceq(cfv(cfv(cco1, cv(s0)), cfv(c3, cv(s0))), c4)))), wcel(c6, universe))
  fvmpt(hs0, c6, universe, cmn1, crab(s0, c1, wa(wne(cv(s0), c2), wceq(cfv(cfv(cco1, cv(s0)), cfv(c3, cv(s0))), c4))), crab(s0, cfv(cbs, cfv(cpl1, cv(hs0))), wa(wne(cv(s0), cfv(c0g, cfv(cpl1, cv(hs0)))), wceq(cfv(cfv(cco1, cv(s0)), cfv(cfv(cdg1, cv(hs0)), cv(s0))), cfv(cur, cv(hs0))))))
  rabeqbidv(s0, cfv(cbs, cfv(cpl1, cv(hs0))), c1, wceq(cv(hs0), c6), wa(wne(cv(s0), cfv(c0g, cfv(cpl1, cv(hs0)))), wceq(cfv(cfv(cco1, cv(s0)), cfv(cfv(cdg1, cv(hs0)), cv(s0))), cfv(cur, cv(hs0)))), wa(wne(cv(s0), c2), wceq(cfv(cfv(cco1, cv(s0)), cfv(c3, cv(s0))), c4)))
  syl6eqr(cfv(cbs, cfv(cpl1, cv(hs0))), c1, cfv(cbs, c5), wceq(cv(hs0), c6))
  fveq2d(cbs, cfv(cpl1, cv(hs0)), c5, wceq(cv(hs0), c6))
  anbi12d(wceq(cv(hs0), c6), wne(cv(s0), cfv(c0g, cfv(cpl1, cv(hs0)))), wceq(cfv(cfv(cco1, cv(s0)), cfv(cfv(cdg1, cv(hs0)), cv(s0))), cfv(cur, cv(hs0))), wne(cv(s0), c2), wceq(cfv(cfv(cco1, cv(s0)), cfv(c3, cv(s0))), c4))
  neeq2d(cv(s0), cfv(c0g, cfv(cpl1, cv(hs0))), c2, wceq(cv(hs0), c6))
  syl6eqr(cfv(c0g, cfv(cpl1, cv(hs0))), c2, cfv(c0g, c5), wceq(cv(hs0), c6))
  fveq2d(c0g, cfv(cpl1, cv(hs0)), c5, wceq(cv(hs0), c6))
  syl6eqr(cfv(cpl1, cv(hs0)), c5, cfv(cpl1, c6), wceq(cv(hs0), c6))
  fveq2(cv(hs0), c6, cpl1)
  eqeq12d(cfv(cfv(cco1, cv(s0)), cfv(cfv(cdg1, cv(hs0)), cv(s0))), cfv(cur, cv(hs0)), cfv(cfv(cco1, cv(s0)), cfv(c3, cv(s0))), c4, wceq(cv(hs0), c6))
  fveq2d(cfv(cco1, cv(s0)), cfv(cfv(cdg1, cv(hs0)), cv(s0)), cfv(c3, cv(s0)), wceq(cv(hs0), c6))
  fveq1d(cfv(cdg1, cv(hs0)), cv(s0), c3, wceq(cv(hs0), c6))
  syl6eqr(cfv(cdg1, cv(hs0)), c3, cfv(cdg1, c6), wceq(cv(hs0), c6))
  fveq2(cv(hs0), c6, cdg1)
  syl6eqr(cfv(cur, cv(hs0)), c4, cfv(cur, c6), wceq(cv(hs0), c6))

blocks.content: The difference of two monic polynomials of the same degree is a polynomial of lesser degree. (Contributed by Stefan O'Rear, 28-Mar-2015.)

thm deg1submon1p(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, class c5, class c6, class c7, wff w0) {
  ‚ä¢ (w0 ‚Üí(c0 `(c1[c2]c3))[<]c4)
  ‚ä£ c0 =(deg1 ` c5)
  ‚ä£ c6 =(Monic1p ` c5)
  ‚ä£ c7 =(Poly1 ` c5)
  ‚ä£ c2 =(-g ` c7)
  ‚ä£ (w0 ‚Üí c5 ‚àà Ring)
  ‚ä£ (w0 ‚Üí c1 ‚àà c6)
  ‚ä£ (w0 ‚Üí(c0 ` c1)= c4)
  ‚ä£ (w0 ‚Üí c3 ‚àà c6)
  ‚ä£ (w0 ‚Üí(c0 ` c3)= c4)
} = {
  deg1sublt(c0, c1, c2, c3, c4, c5, c7, (Base ` c7), (coe1 ` c1), (coe1 ` c3), w0)
  eqbrtrd((c0 ` c1), cle, c4, c4, w0)
  syl(w0, c3 ‚àà(Base ` c7), c3 ‚àà c6)
  mon1pcl(c3, c6, (Base ` c7), c7, c5)
  eqbrtrd((c0 ` c3), cle, c4, c4, w0)
  leidd(c4, w0)
  nn0red(c4, w0)
  eqeltrrd(c4, cn0, (c0 ` c1), w0)
  syl3anc(w0, (c0 ` c1)‚àà ‚Ñï0, c5 ‚àà Ring, c1 ‚àà(Base ` c7), c1 ‚â†(0 ` c7))
  syl(w0, c1 ‚àà(Base ` c7), c1 ‚àà c6)
  mon1pcl(c1, c6, (Base ` c7), c7, c5)
  syl(w0, c1 ‚â†(0 ` c7), c1 ‚àà c6)
  mon1pn0(c1, c6, (0 ` c7), c7, c5)
  deg1nn0cl(c5, c1, (Base ` c7), (0 ` c7), c0, c7)
  eqid((0 ` c7))
  eqid((Base ` c7))
  eqid((coe1 ` c1))
  eqid((coe1 ` c3))
  3eqtr2d(((coe1 ` c1)` c4), ((coe1 ` c3)` c4), (1r ` c5), ((coe1 ` c3)`(c0 ` c3)), w0)
  eqtr3d(((coe1 ` c1)` c4), (1r ` c5), ((coe1 ` c1)`(c0 ` c1)), w0)
  fveq2d((coe1 ` c1), (c0 ` c1), c4, w0)
  syl(w0, ((coe1 ` c1)`(c0 ` c1))=(1r ` c5), c1 ‚àà c6)
  mon1pldg(c1, c6, c0, (1r ` c5), c5)
  syl(w0, ((coe1 ` c3)`(c0 ` c3))=(1r ` c5), c3 ‚àà c6)
  mon1pldg(c3, c6, c0, (1r ` c5), c5)
  eqid((1r ` c5))
  fveq2d((coe1 ` c3), (c0 ` c3), c4, w0)
}

blocks.name: ply1rem
blocks.content: The polynomial remainder theorem, or little Bézout's theorem (by contrast to the regular Bézout's theorem ~ bezout ). If a polynomial ` F ` is divided by the linear factor ` x - A ` , the remainder is equal to ` F ( A ) ` , the evaluation of the polynomial at ` A ` (interpreted as a constant polynomial). (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 12-Jun-2015.)

blocks.name: fta1g
blocks.content: The one-sided fundamental theorem of algebra. A polynomial of degree ` n ` has at most ` n ` roots. Unlike the real fundamental theorem ~ fta , which is only true in ` CC ` and other algebraically closed fields, this is true in any integral domain. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 12-Jun-2015.)

blocks.name: fta1b
blocks.content: The assumption that ` R ` be a domain in ~ fta1g is necessary. Here we show that the statement is strong enough to prove that ` R ` is a domain. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 12-Jun-2015.)
blocks.origin:

blocks.name: ig1peu
blocks.content: There is a unique monic polynomial of minimal degree in any nonzero ideal. (Contributed by Stefan O'Rear, 29-Mar-2015.) (Revised by AV, 25-Sep-2020.)

blocks.name: ig1prsp
blocks.content: Any ideal of polynomials over a division ring is generated by the ideal's canonical generator. (Contributed by Stefan O'Rear, 29-Mar-2015.)
blocks.origin:
thm ig1prsp(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, class c5) {
  |- wi(wa(wcel(c0, cdr), wcel(c1, c2)), wceq(c1, cfv(c3, csn(cfv(c4, c1)))))
  -| wceq(c5, cfv(cpl1, c0))
  -| wceq(c4, cfv(cig1p, c0))
  -| wceq(c2, cfv(clidl, c5))
  -| wceq(c3, cfv(crsp, c5))
} = {
  mpbir2and(wa(wcel(c0, cdr), wcel(c1, c2)), wceq(c1, cfv(c3, csn(cfv(c4, c1)))), wcel(cfv(c4, c1), c1), wral(hs0, c1, wbr(cfv(c4, c1), cfv(cdsr, c5), cv(hs0))))
  ralrimiva(hs0, c1, wa(wcel(c0, cdr), wcel(c1, c2)), wbr(cfv(c4, c1), cfv(cdsr, c5), cv(hs0)))
  3expa(wcel(c0, cdr), wcel(c1, c2), wcel(cv(hs0), c1), wbr(cfv(c4, c1), cfv(cdsr, c5), cv(hs0)))
  ig1pdvds(c0, c1, c2, cv(hs0), c4, cfv(cdsr, c5), c5)
  syl3anc(wa(wcel(c0, cdr), wcel(c1, c2)), wb(wceq(c1, cfv(c3, csn(cfv(c4, c1)))), wa(wcel(cfv(c4, c1), c1), wral(hs0, c1, wbr(cfv(c4, c1), cfv(cdsr, c5), cv(hs0))))), wcel(c5, crg), wcel(c1, c2), wcel(cfv(c4, c1), cfv(cbs, c5)))
  adantr(wcel(c0, cdr), wcel(c1, c2), wcel(c5, crg))
  syl(wcel(c0, cdr), wcel(c5, crg), wcel(c0, crg))
  drngring(c0)
  ply1ring(c0, c5)
  simpr(wcel(c0, cdr), wcel(c1, c2))
  sseldd(cfv(c4, c1), cfv(cbs, c5), c1, wa(wcel(c0, cdr), wcel(c1, c2)))
  adantl(wcel(c0, cdr), wcel(c1, c2), wss(c1, cfv(cbs, c5)))
  lidlss(c1, c2, cfv(cbs, c5), c5)

  eqid(cfv(cbs, c5))
  eqid(cfv(cdsr, c5))
  diff.hs0.w(wa(wcel(c0, cdr), wcel(c1, c2)))
  diff.hs0.c(c5)
  diff.hs0.c(c1)
  diff.hs0.c(c2)
  diff.hs0.c(cfv(c4, c1))
  diff.hs0.c(cfv(cbs, c5))
  diff.hs0.c(c3)
  diff.hs0.c(cfv(cdsr, c5))
}

  ply1ring(c0, c5)
  simpr(c0 ‚àà DivRing, c1 ‚àà c2)
  sseldd((c4 ` c1), (Base ` c5), c1, (c0 ‚àà DivRing ‚àß c1 ‚àà c2))
  adantl(c0 ‚àà DivRing, c1 ‚àà c2, c1 ‚äÜ(Base ` c5))
  lidlss(c1, c2, (Base ` c5), c5)
  ig1pcl(c0, c1, c2, c4, c5)
  lidldvgen(hs0, c5, c1, c2, (c4 ` c1), (Base ` c5), c3, (||r ` c5))
  eqid((Base ` c5))
  eqid((||r ` c5))
  diff.hs0.w((c0 ‚àà DivRing ‚àß c1 ‚àà c2))
  diff.hs0.c(c5)
  diff.hs0.c(c1)
  diff.hs0.c(c2)
  diff.hs0.c((c4 ` c1))
  diff.hs0.c((Base ` c5))
  diff.hs0.c(c3)
  diff.hs0.c((||r ` c5))
}

blocks.name: ply1lpir
blocks.content: The ring of polynomials over a division ring has the principal ideal property. (Contributed by Stefan O'Rear, 29-Mar-2015.)
blocks.origin:
thm ply1lpir(class c0, class c1) {
  |- wi(wcel(c0, cdr), wcel(c1, clpir))
  -| wceq(c1, cfv(cpl1, c0))
} = {
  sylanbrc(wcel(c0, cdr), wcel(c1, clpir), wcel(c1, crg), wss(cfv(clidl, c1), cfv(clpidl, c1)))
  ssrdv(hs0, cfv(clidl, c1), cfv(clpidl, c1), wcel(c0, cdr))
  ex(wcel(c0, cdr), wcel(cv(hs0), cfv(clidl, c1)), wcel(cv(hs0), cfv(clpidl, c1)))
  mpbird(wa(wcel(c0, cdr), wcel(cv(hs0), cfv(clidl, c1))), wcel(cv(hs0), cfv(clpidl, c1)), wrex(hs1, cfv(cbs, c1), wceq(cv(hs0), cfv(cfv(crsp, c1), csn(cv(hs1))))))
  syl2anc(wa(wcel(c0, cdr), wcel(cv(hs0), cfv(clidl, c1))), wrex(hs1, cfv(cbs, c1), wceq(cv(hs0), cfv(cfv(crsp, c1), csn(cv(hs1))))), wcel(cfv(cfv(cig1p, c0), cv(hs0)), cfv(cbs, c1)), wceq(cv(hs0), cfv(cfv(crsp, c1), csn(cfv(cfv(cig1p, c0), cv(hs0))))))
  sseldd(cfv(cfv(cig1p, c0), cv(hs0)), cfv(cbs, c1), cv(hs0), wa(wcel(c0, cdr), wcel(cv(hs0), cfv(clidl, c1))))
  adantl(wcel(c0, cdr), wcel(cv(hs0), cfv(clidl, c1)), wss(cv(hs0), cfv(cbs, c1)))
  lidlss(cv(hs0), cfv(clidl, c1), cfv(cbs, c1), c1)
  ig1pcl(c0, cv(hs0), cfv(clidl, c1), cfv(cig1p, c0), c1)
  ig1prsp(c0, cv(hs0), cfv(clidl, c1), cfv(crsp, c1), cfv(cig1p, c0), c1)
  eqid(cfv(cig1p, c0))
  rspceeqv(hs1, cfv(cfv(cig1p, c0), cv(hs0)), cfv(cbs, c1), cv(hs0), cfv(cfv(crsp, c1), csn(cfv(cfv(cig1p, c0), cv(hs0)))), cfv(cfv(crsp, c1), csn(cv(hs1))))
  fveq2d(cfv(crsp, c1), csn(cv(hs1)), csn(cfv(cfv(cig1p, c0), cv(hs0))), wceq(cv(hs1), cfv(cfv(cig1p, c0), cv(hs0))))
  sneq(cv(hs1), cfv(cfv(cig1p, c0), cv(hs0)))
  syl(wa(wcel(c0, cdr), wcel(cv(hs0), cfv(clidl, c1))), wb(wcel(cv(hs0), cfv(clpidl, c1)), wrex(hs1, cfv(cbs, c1), wceq(cv(hs0), cfv(cfv(crsp, c1), csn(cv(hs1)))))), wcel(c1, crg))
  adantr(wcel(c0, cdr), wcel(cv(hs0), cfv(clidl, c1)), wcel(c1, crg))
  syl(wcel(c0, cdr), wcel(c1, crg), wcel(c0, crg))
  drngring(c0)
  ply1ring(c0, c1)
  islpidl(hs1, c1, cv(hs0), cfv(clpidl, c1), cfv(cbs, c1), cfv(crsp, c1))
  eqid(cfv(crsp, c1))
  eqid(cfv(cbs, c1))
  islpir2(c1, cfv(clidl, c1), cfv(clpidl, c1))
  eqid(cfv(clpidl, c1))
  eqid(cfv(clidl, c1))
  diff.hs0.c(cfv(clidl, c1))
  diff.hs0.c(cfv(clpidl, c1))
  diff.hs0.w(wcel(c0, cdr))
  diff.hs1.c(cfv(cfv(cig1p, c0), cv(hs0)))
  diff.hs1.c(cfv(cbs, c1))
  diff.hs1.c(cv(hs0))
  diff.hs1.c(cfv(cfv(crsp, c1), csn(cfv(cfv(cig1p, c0), cv(hs0)))))
  diff.hs1.c(c1)
  diff.hs1.c(cfv(clpidl, c1))
  diff.hs1.c(cfv(crsp, c1))
}
blocks.pretty:
thm ply1lpir(class c0, class c1) {
  ‚ä¢ (c0 ‚àà DivRing ‚Üí c1 ‚àà LPIR)
  ‚ä£ c1 =(Poly1 ` c0)
} = {
  sylanbrc(c0 ‚àà DivRing, c1 ‚àà LPIR, c1 ‚àà Ring, (LIdeal ` c1)‚äÜ(LPIdeal ` c1))

  mpbird((c0 ‚àà DivRing ‚àß hs0 ‚àà(LIdeal ` c1)), hs0 ‚àà(LPIdeal ` c1), ‚àÉ(hs1 ‚àà(Base ` c1), hs0 =((RSpan ` c1)` { hs1 })))
  syl2anc((c0 ‚àà DivRing ‚àß hs0 ‚àà(LIdeal ` c1)), ‚àÉ(hs1 ‚àà(Base ` c1), hs0 =((RSpan ` c1)` { hs1 })), ((idlGen1p ` c0)` hs0)‚àà(Base ` c1), hs0 =((RSpan ` c1)` {((idlGen1p ` c0)` hs0)}))
  sseldd(((idlGen1p ` c0)` hs0), (Base ` c1), hs0, (c0 ‚àà DivRing ‚àß hs0 ‚àà(LIdeal ` c1)))
  adantl(c0 ‚àà DivRing, hs0 ‚àà(LIdeal ` c1), hs0 ‚äÜ(Base ` c1))

  ig1prsp(c0, hs0, (LIdeal ` c1), (RSpan ` c1), (idlGen1p ` c0), c1)

  rspceeqv(hs1, ((idlGen1p ` c0)` hs0), (Base ` c1), hs0, ((RSpan ` c1)` {((idlGen1p ` c0)` hs0)}), ((RSpan ` c1)` { hs1 }))
  fveq2d((RSpan ` c1), { hs1 }, {((idlGen1p ` c0)` hs0)}, hs1 =((idlGen1p ` c0)` hs0))
  sneq(hs1, ((idlGen1p ` c0)` hs0))
  syl((c0 ‚àà DivRing ‚àß hs0 ‚àà(LIdeal ` c1)), (hs0 ‚àà(LPIdeal ` c1)‚Üî ‚àÉ(hs1 ‚àà(Base ` c1), hs0 =((RSpan ` c1)` { hs1 }))), c1 ‚àà Ring)
  adantr(c0 ‚àà DivRing, hs0 ‚àà(LIdeal ` c1), c1 ‚àà Ring)
  syl(c0 ‚àà DivRing, c1 ‚àà Ring, c0 ‚àà Ring)
  drngring(c0)
  ply1ring(c0, c1)
  islpidl(hs1, c1, hs0, (LPIdeal ` c1), (Base ` c1), (RSpan ` c1))
  eqid((RSpan ` c1))
  eqid((Base ` c1))
  islpir2(c1, (LIdeal ` c1), (LPIdeal ` c1))

  eqid((LIdeal ` c1))
  diff.hs0.c((LIdeal ` c1))
  diff.hs0.c((LPIdeal ` c1))
  diff.hs0.w(c0 ‚àà DivRing)
  diff.hs1.c(((idlGen1p ` c0)` hs0))
  diff.hs1.c((Base ` c1))
  diff.hs1.c(hs0)
  diff.hs1.c(((RSpan ` c1)` {((idlGen1p ` c0)` hs0)}))

  diff.hs1.c((RSpan ` c1))

blocks.name: ply1pid
blocks.content: The polynomials over a field are a PID. (Contributed by Stefan O'Rear, 29-Mar-2015.)
blocks.origin:
thm ply1pid(class c0, class c1) {
  |- wi(wcel(c0, cfield), wcel(c1, cpid))
  -| wceq(c1, cfv(cpl1, c0))
} = {
  sylanbrc(wcel(c0, cfield), wcel(c1, cpid), wcel(c1, cidom), wcel(c1, clpir))
  syl(wcel(c0, cfield), wcel(c1, cidom), wcel(c0, cidom))
  fldidom(c0)
  ply1idom(c0, c1)
  syl(wcel(c0, cfield), wcel(c1, clpir), wcel(c0, cdr))
  simplbi(wcel(c0, cfield), wcel(c0, cdr), wcel(c0, ccrg))
  isfld(c0)
  ply1lpir(c0, c1)
  elin2(c1, cpid, cidom, clpir)
  df-pid()
}
